summary: A group of convicts and a doctor seek refuge from the authorities in a lodge deep in the wood, but the weird inhabitants are not friendly.
cast: Christopher Kriesa|Martina Ittenbach|Simon Newby|Luca Maric|Mehmet Yilmaz|Jaymes Butler|Dan van Husen|Daryl Jackson|Wolfgang Müller|James Matthews-Pyecka|Klaus Münster|Gerhard Jilka|Harald Pucher|Lisa Sachsenweger|Gunter Bender|Christian Scholz|Marion Grundies|Jürgen Prochnow|Thomas Reitmair|Oskar Bender|Daniela Sachsenweger|Rainer Metz|Jeff Motherhead|Chris Schmidlin|Cyrill Geffcken|Tom Littich|Ala Freyberg|Harald Schuster|Salvatore Pascale|Barrett Jones|Oliver Bartusch|Jackie|Erik Lucas|Olaf Ittenbach|Juergen Goettle|Martin Weiss|Gottfried Mach|Baerlie|Lotte|Chi-Cho|Zach Weisman|Dominik Lienhard|Yazid Benfeghoul|Christoph Klein|Volker Schiller|Christian Lohmer|Leo Pachmann|Markus Binder
title: House of blood
